unnormalised: Hey folks, ever felt Delhi's air hitting you like a ton of bricks lately? You're not imagining it! Air quality across North India, especially around Diwali, has been, well, let's just say Shah Rukh Khan wouldn't be filming "Swades" here right now.
normalised: Hey folks, ever felt Delhi's air hitting you like a ton of bricks lately? You're not imagining it! Air quality across North India, especially around Diwali, has been, well, let's just say Shah Rukh Khan wouldn't be filming "Swades" here right now.

unnormalised: The Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) reports that PM2.5 levels are spiking in several cities. Kanpur's also feeling the pinch, and even Lucknow's typically breezy evenings are getting a bit hazy.
normalised: The Central Pollution Control Board (C P C B) reports that P M two point five levels are spiking in several cities. Kanpur's also feeling the pinch, and even Lucknow's typically breezy evenings are getting a bit hazy.

unnormalised: Experts from IIT-Kanpur are saying crop burning in neighboring states, coupled with cooler temperatures trapping pollutants, are major culprits. They're suggesting stricter enforcement of existing regulations.
normalised: Experts from I I T-Kanpur are saying crop burning in neighboring states, coupled with cooler temperatures trapping pollutants, are major culprits. They're suggesting stricter enforcement of existing regulations.

unnormalised: Remember those "Odd-Even" schemes Delhi tried? Seems like we might need something similar again.
normalised: Remember those "Odd-Even" schemes Delhi tried? Seems like we might need something similar again.

unnormalised: Breathing easy shouldn't be a luxury, right? Let's hope authorities take swift action before our lungs start resembling old bicycle tires. Time to dust off those masks, folks!
normalised: Breathing easy shouldn't be a luxury, right? Let's hope authorities take swift action before our lungs start resembling old bicycle tires. Time to dust off those masks, folks!
